long_description: Perfect for water sports and casual wear, the Tifosi Dolomite 2.0 Polarized Fototec Sunglasses adjust rapidly to changing light conditions for superior clarity and eye protection. Sunglasses offer a 32.1 - 11.9% range of light transmission for use in cloudy to sunny conditions. Neutral smoke tint minimizes color distortion, blocks light reflection off water or other horizontal surfaces and reduces eye fatigue and glare. Grilamid TR-90 homopolyamide nylon frames offer extremely high bending strength, low density and high resistance to chemical and UV damage. Hydrophilic rubber ear and nose pieces for no-slip stability; adjustable temples and nose pieces for custom fit. The Tifosi Dolomite 2.0 Polarized Fototec Sunglasses feature vented lenses that improve air circulation and help prevent fogging.
short_description: Perfect for water sports and casual wear, the Tifosi Dolomite 2.0 Polarized Fototec Sunglasses adjust rapidly to changing light conditions for superior clarity and eye protection.
